DOC.brief_summary: This study multi-site , unmasked PMS Study . The purpose study evaluate physical effect Systane Lubricant Eye Drops .
DOC.brief_title: A Multi-Site Post Marketing Surveillance Study Systane Indian Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study multi-site , unmasked PMS Study . The purpose study evaluate physical effect Systane Lubricant Eye Drops . The assessed effect include : corneal conjunctival staining , ocular sign symptom . This two week prospective study .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old , sex , race . Willing able make require visit follow study instruction . A sodium fluorescein corneal stain sum > / 3 either eye . A bestcorrected visual acuity 0.6 log MAR good eye assess ETDRS chart A history evidence ocular intraocular surgery either eye within past 6 month . Lasik patient include Lasik surgery > 6 month prior initiation study . A history intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication .
